Viterbi - decoding Bi - LSTM - CRF and I.from sentence:
6.3 CoNLL - 2003 English NER 6.3.1 Sentence - level prediction lists F 1 scores of models predicting with sentence - level context on CoNLL - 2003 .
				  The Viterbi - decoding Bi - LSTM - CRF and ID - CNN - CRF and greedy ID - CNN obtain the highest average scores , with the ID - CNN - CRF outperforming the Bi - LSTM - CRF by 0.11 points of F1 on average , and the Bi - LSTM - CRF out - performing the greedy ID - CNN by 0.11 as well .

greedy ID - CNN.outperforms: Bi - LSTM and the 4 - layer CNN
greedy ID - CNN.from sentence: Our greedy ID - CNN outperforms the Bi - LSTM and the 4 - layer CNN , which uses the same number of parameters as the ID - CNN , and performs similarly to the 5 - layer CNN which uses more parameters but covers the same effective input width .

ID - CNN.from sentence: When paired with Viterbi decoding , our ID - CNN performs on par with the Bi - LSTM , showing that the ID - CNN is also an effective token encoder for structured inference .

Document - level prediction.from sentence:
Document - level prediction
In we show that adding document - level context improves every model on CoNLL - 2003 .

greedy model.out - performed by: Bi - LSTM - CRF reported in Chiu and Nichols ( 2016 )

OntoNotes 5.0 English NER.from sentence:
OntoNotes 5.0 English NER
Our greedy model is out - performed by the Bi - LSTM - CRF reported in Chiu and Nichols ( 2016 ) as well as our own re-implementation , which appears to be the new state - of - the - art on this dataset .
